answers.answer: Is it just swollen in the morning or all day? You should probably see a doc just in case, could be preeclampsia (even if it's just high blood pressure, it should probably be treated).
While it only does it at night
Mine did that couple nights ago and im 35 weeks. One foot swollen could be high blood pressure or you need to rest more w your legs up...it should go down little

question: I'm 35 weeks and just my right foot is swollen is something going wrong?
title: foot swollen
